description.en: Joy, Anger, Sorrow bring those 3 Rubies to the altar.
description.ar: Joy, Anger, Sorrow bring those 3 Rubies to the altar.
description.br: Alegria, Ira e Tristeza trazem esses 3 Rubis ao altar.
description.cns: 将快乐、愤怒、悲哀这 3 颗宝石放到祭坛上。
description.de: (Questitem) Joy, Anger, Sorrow - bring diese 3 Arten von Rubinen zum Altar of Ivillis, dann kommst du zu einem unbekannten Ort.
description.fi: Joy, Anger, Sorrow bring those 3 Rubies to the altar.
description.fil: Joy, Anger, Sorrow bring those 3 Rubies to the altar.
description.fr: Joie, Colère, Chagrin : Apporte ces trois Rubis à l'autel d'Ivillis, alors tu pourras explorer un endroit encore inconnu...
description.id: Joy, Anger, Sorrow membawa 3 Ruby itu ke altar.
description.it: Joy, Anger, Sorrow bring those 3 Rubies to the altar.
description.jp: 喜びの感情を持ったルビー。喜び、怒り、悲しみ、イブリス神殿には感情を持ったルビーが3種類あると伝えられている。
description.kr: 기쁨, 노여움, 슬픔.. 이 세가지 감정을 가지고 있는 루비를 제단으로 가져가세요.
description.nl: Joy, Anger, Sorrow bring those 3 Rubies to the altar.
description.pl: Joy, Anger, Sorrow bring those 3 Rubies to the altar.
description.ru: Joy, Anger, Sorrow bring those 3 Rubies to the altar.
description.sp: Alegría, Ira y Dolor. Lleva los 3 Rubíes al altar.
description.sw: Joy, Anger, Sorrow bring those 3 Rubies to the altar.
description.th: Joy, Anger, Sorrow นำRubies3 เม็ดนั้นมาที่แท่นบูชา
description.tw: 喜悅、憤怒、悲傷將這 3 顆紅寶石帶到祭壇。
description.vi: Joy, Anger, Sorrow mang 3 viên hồng ngọc đó lên tôn thờ.
